attributes.action: Be driven around in an economical car
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is for the prime minister to change the vehicle he is driven around in from a luxury saloon, which is highly poluting and very uneconomical, to an eco friendly car like a Toyota Prius. This government has announced that it is going to raise car tax to encourage us to be greener. Well maybe the prime minister should set an example to us all first!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
